alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:39PM EST until February 14 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Plymouth MA, Western Plymouth MA, Southern Plymouth MA and Barnstable MA Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Steady snow will expand across Cape Cod through early evening. A few heavier bands of snow may impact the region tonight. The steadiest snow will taper off by daybreak, but light snow or flurries may linger into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
